anya-e1211n:10: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṃ pāletha.
anya-e1211n:21: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṃ na kare
anya-e1211n:69: Bho guṇavaṃ purisa tvampi dānaṃ dehi
anya-e1211n:70: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṃ detha
anya-e1211n:89: Bho gacchaṃ yaññadatta tvaṃ maṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:191: Jantumpetaṃ kaṭaṃ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:192: Jantupete kaṭaṃ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:195: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṃ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n:196: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:209: Bho satthā tvaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ pālaya
anya-e1211n:223: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṃ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n:408: Bho yāgu tvaṃ pana khudaṃ bhana
anya-e1211n:428: Bho mātā tvaṃ pana ciraṃ jīva
anya-e1211n:454: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n:455: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n:520: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:521: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n:530: Bho gacchaṃ guṇavaṃ tvaṃ pana sugatiṃ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n:550: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṃ tvaṃ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n:554: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:555: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ nimmitaṃ
anya-e1211n:570: Bho daṇḍī tvaṃ pana kammaṃ karohi
anya-e1211n:584: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n:585: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:590: Bho āyu tvaṃ pana jīvitaṃ pālehi
anya-e1211n:604: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṃ patiṭhitaṃ sabbadā
anya-e1211n:605: Āyūsu kho pana manaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:611: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n:616: Kānici pana saheva etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ.
anya-e1211n:622: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṃ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n:623: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṃ karotha kusalaṃ sadā.
anya-e1211n:625: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṃ.
anya-e1211n:636: Sabbasmiṃ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:637: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n:640: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n:641: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṃ khitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:642: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṃ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:643: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṃ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:645: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṃ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n:646: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṃ kammaṃ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n:649: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṃ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n:650: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṃ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:652: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṃ;
anya-e1211n:655: Sabbāsaṃ pana gaṅgānaṃ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:656: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṃ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:657: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n:662: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṃ puññaṃ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:663: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṃ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:664: Sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ samādāya pāraṃ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n:665: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e1211n:676: Sabbasmiṃ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:700: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṃ puññaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:701: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:702: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:703: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:704: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci kaññaṃ puññaṃ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:705: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:706: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṃ kataṃ
anya-e1211n:707: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n:708: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n:709: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṃsu
anya-e1211n:710: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṃ adadī
anya-e1211n:712: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n:713: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n:714: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṃ
anya-e1211n:716: Pubbāyaṃ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṃ cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:717: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e1211n:720: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci pana bahuṃ puccaṃ akarī
anya-e1211n:721: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ akaruṃ
anya-e1211n:722: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ akaro
anya-e1211n:723: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṃ puññaṃ akarittha
anya-e1211n:724: Pubbaṃ yaṃ kiṃci puññaṃ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n:725: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṃsu ekacce
anya-e1211n:752: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n:753: Ekesaṃ garūnaṃ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n:758: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate
anya-e1211n:776: Ekaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:794: Yo koci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n:795: Ye keci taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n:796: Yaṃ kiṃci dāsaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:797: Ye keci dāse gāmaṃ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:802: Yassa kassaci dānaṃ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n:812: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:813: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:814: Yaṃ kiṃci vanitaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n:815: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṃ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n:816: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n:817: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṃ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n:818: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:819: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n:820: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:821: Yāsaṃ kāsaṃci vanitānaṃ ābharaṇaṃ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:822: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:823: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:826: Yāyaṃ kāyaṃci vanitāyaṃ me cittaṃ na ramati
anya-e1211n:827: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:830: Yaṃ kiṃci kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:831: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:832: Yaṃ kiṃci bahuṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n:833: Yāni kānici bahuṃ puññaṃ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n:863: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n:866: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:880: Tāyaṃ khattiya kaññāyaṃ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n:884: Taṃ kulaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:885: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:886: Taṃ kulaṃ uddissa puññaṃ karoti koci
anya-e1211n:887: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n:902: Eso sisso ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchati
anya-e1211n:903: Ete sissā ca garuṃ dhammaṃ pucchanti
anya-e1211n:920: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṃ kammaṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n:930: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n:931: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n:938: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:940: Etaṃ kulaṃ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n:941: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n:944: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṃ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n:945: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:946: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṃ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n:947: Etesaṃ kulānaṃ pana dhanaṃ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n:948: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n:949: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n:952: Etasmiṃ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n:953: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:956: Ayaṃ jano pana taṃ purisaṃ puññaṃ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:957: Ime janā te purise puññaṃ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:974: Ayaṃ kaññā pana bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:984: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:985: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:992: Imaṃ cittaṃ pana attano santānaṃ vijānāti
anya-e1211n:1000: Imassa cittassa ovādaṃ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n:1001: Imesaṃ cittānaṃ ovādaṃ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n:1010: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ toseti
anya-e1211n:1016: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1017: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1024: Amusmiṃ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n:1025: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1028: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti
anya-e1211n:1034: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n:1035: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n:1039: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n:1043: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1046: Aduṃ dhanavaṃ niccaṃ bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati
anya-e1211n:1064: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṃ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n:1065: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
anya-e1211n:1066: Kaṃsi tvaṃ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n:1067: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1068: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto kuvaṃ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n:1069: Kehidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n:1070: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n:1071: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṃ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n:1073: Kesaṃ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n:1075: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1076: Kassa tvaṃ dhammamaññāya vācaṃ bhasayi īdisaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1078: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n:1082: Kā ca suphassayaṃ dānaṃ mañcapīṭhādikaṃ adā;
anya-e1211n:1083: Kāyo nānāvidhaṃ puññaṃ katvāna tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1084: Kaṃ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṃ sīlaṃ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n:1085: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n:1086: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n:1087: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n:1088: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1089: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1093: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n:1094: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:1095: Kāsaṃ kho pana kaññānaṃ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n:1096: Kassaṃ nadiṃ pana macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n:1097: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṃ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n:1100: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n:1101: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṃ jānema taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1102: Kiṃ tvaṃ attavasaṃ disvā mama dajjāsimaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1103: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṃ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1106: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṃ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n:1107: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṃ saddho yajati gotamaṃ.
anya-e1211n:1108: Kassa so kayirā mettiṃ tamāhu cariyaṃ budhā;
anya-e1211n:1110: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ iti rājā apucchitaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1111: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n:1114: Kasmiṃ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṃ passāmi dukkaṭaṃ;
anya-e1211n:1115: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṃ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n:1164: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṃ uppajjati
anya-e1211n:1168: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṃ patiṭhitaṃ
anya-e1211n:1238: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n:1239: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n:1241: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n:1242: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n:1243: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n:1606: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sataṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1609: Taṃ lakkhanti vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā dasasatasahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1623: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṃ rathā
anya-e1211n:1624: Rathe rathe sataṃ assā asse asse sataṃ narā
anya-e1211n:1625: Nare nare sataṃ kaññā eke kissaṃ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n:1631: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
